1.title: Overcoming Anxiety
1.description: Learn practical techniques to manage and reduce anxiety in daily life through evidence-based cognitive behavioral therapy methods.
1.longDescription: This comprehensive course provides you with the tools and strategies needed to understand, manage, and overcome anxiety. Through a combination of theoretical knowledge and practical exercises, you'll learn how anxiety works, identify your personal triggers, and develop a toolkit of coping strategies that you can use in any situation.

instructor.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
instructor.title: Licensed Clinical Psychologist
instructor.bio: Dr. Sarah Johnson has over 12 years of experience in clinical psychology, specializing in anxiety disorders and cognitive behavioral therapy.

outcomes: Understand the science behind anxiety and how it affects your body and mind
Identify personal anxiety triggers and develop awareness of your patterns
Master breathing techniques and progressive muscle relaxation
Learn cognitive restructuring to challenge anxious thoughts
Develop a personalized anxiety management plan
Build confidence in handling anxiety-provoking situations

modules_detail.title: Understanding Anxiety
lessons: What is Anxiety? The Science Behind It

reviews.name: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.comment: This course completely changed my approach to managing anxiety. The practical techniques are easy to implement and really work!

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: Dr. Johnson's expertise really shows. The content is well-structured and the exercises are incredibly helpful.

2.title: Confident Public Speaking
2.description: Master the art of public speaking and overcome stage fright with proven techniques and practical exercises.
2.longDescription: Transform your fear of public speaking into confidence with this comprehensive course. Whether you're presenting at work, speaking at events, or just want to feel more comfortable in group settings, this course provides you with the skills and confidence you need to speak with impact and authenticity.

instructor.name: Mark Thompson
instructor.title: Professional Speaker & Communication Coach
instructor.bio: Mark Thompson has been a professional speaker for over 15 years and has helped thousands of people overcome their fear of public speaking.

outcomes: Overcome stage fright and speaking anxiety
Structure compelling presentations that engage your audience
Use body language and voice effectively
Handle difficult questions and situations with confidence
Build lasting confidence in all speaking situations

reviews.name: Sarah Williams
reviews.comment: Mark's teaching style is incredible. I went from being terrified of speaking to actually enjoying presentations!

reviews.name: David Park
reviews.comment: The practical exercises really helped me build confidence. I can now speak in front of large groups without fear.

3.title: Decision Making Mastery
3.description: Learn to make better decisions faster with frameworks and techniques used by top executives and entrepreneurs.
3.longDescription: Decision-making is one of the most critical skills for success in both personal and professional life. This course teaches you systematic approaches to making better decisions, avoiding common cognitive biases, and building confidence in your choices.

instructor.name: Dr. Emily Chen
instructor.title: Behavioral Economist & Decision Science Expert
instructor.bio: Dr. Emily Chen is a leading expert in decision science with a PhD in Behavioral Economics from Stanford University.

outcomes: Improve decision quality in uncertain situations
Apply decision science to real-world problems

modules_detail.title: Decision Science Fundamentals
lessons: Types of Decisions and Their Challenges

reviews.name: James Miller
reviews.comment: Dr. Chen's approach to decision making is revolutionary. I make much better choices now in both business and life.

reviews.name: Lisa Zhang
reviews.comment: Great frameworks and practical tools. The content on cognitive biases was especially eye-opening.
